name: Orb fighter
description:
See if you can get a massive high score in the arcade style dungeon-crawler with retro  playing mechanics fighting your way to the end, kill all orbs !

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
